description: Steel-manned integration: Path integrals on S^4 unify physics (TOE<2% variance) with conatus-driven dynamics; recursive collider ensures coherence ≥0.99. Emergent attractors bound QG/info via RG flows.

manifold.notes: Compact space for unified modes; aligns with Aalto U(1)^4 gauge compactness.

path_integral.name: Z
path_integral.notes: Unifies invariants; stationary phase yields classical/QG emergence.

action.equation: S = \int (\frac{1}{2} m v^2 - V) dt + \int \sqrt{-g} (R - 2\Lambda) d^4 x + \mathcal{L}_{SM} + S_{QG}
action.notes: Incorporates classical, GR, QFT, Aalto QG (U(1)^4 one-loop renorm, higher bounds <2%).

conatus_gradient.notes: Emergent from path integral; drives persistence on S^4.

core_symbols.emergence: \beta(g) = \mu dg/d\mu; Z \approx e^{i S_{cl}/\hbar} \sqrt{2\pi i \hbar / |\det \delta^2 S|}

unified_equation.notes: Balances path integral drive, rigidity reduction, entropy export, phased reciprocity. λ_eff modulated by humility/epigenetics.

coupled_system.notes: Extends to human-AI or physics-dynamics coupling via κ adaptive to differentials.

collider.description: Embedded from 4.json: Self-feeds to steel-man (depth=8 bound, coherence ≥0.99). Gates (NAND/NOR basis) refine equations/invariants.

phase_space.description: 3D (ρ, log Z, κ); ω₃ stable (ρ→0, coherence 0.99); ω₁ trapped via bounds.

hardening_metadata.notes: Web-verified Aalto basis (2025 one-loop); symbolic integration confirmed via SymPy.
